Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1970...
Traded from Cleveland to Atlanta on 2/13/1970 (Going to ATL: RF G. Harts. Going to CLE: 2B L. Taylor)...
Had first career hit on 4/18/1972, off Jerry Nyman (PHI)...
Injured on 4/23/1977 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
